Welcome!

Not feeling the best physically or mentally? We hope our content can cheer you up!

You can let inspirational quotes motivate you, track your mood and/or symptoms, find natural remedies (not guaranteed to work) for basic health issues, look at creative minds at work, or interact with other users of this website!

To sign up, click here!

If you feel bothered by something on our website or have suggestions and/or feedback please don't hesitate to reach out to us!

An app similar in layout to the layout of this website is coming soon!

Inspirational Quotes

Not feeling up to doing something you were psyched about before? Feel like you've accomplished nothing recently?

Click to get your inspirational quote of the day!

Not happy with your quote? There's now an option to get a new quote until you're satisfied!

Share it with your friends and family to spread the motivation!

Updating with more quotes everyday!

Natural Remedies

DISCLAIMER! WE ARE NOT DOCTORS AND THESE SOLUTIONS AREN'T GUARANTEED TO WORK!

  • Green tea for arthritis
  • Oatmeal for itchy skin and bug bites
  • Chicken soup for cold and congestion
  • Honey for wound healing
  • Sugar for hiccups
  • Flaxseed for constipation
  • Ginger as an antiemetic
  • Peppermint for nausea and digestive issues

More hacks coming soon!
